actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide assistance for the treatment of epilepsy.

summary.text: Amends title III (General Powers and Duties of Public Health Service) of the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish an epilepsy program. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide assistance for the treatment of epilepsy.
